r2dii.dataraw 0.0.2.9003

  • r2dii

A dataset outlining various region definitions (using iso codes)

Source: R/region_isos.R
region_isos.Rd

This is a dataset useful when mapping regional benchmarks to countries.

region_isos

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 1044 rows and 2 columns.

See also

data_dictionary

Other demo datasets: ald_demo, data_dictionary(), iso_codes, loanbook_demo, overwrite_demo, scenario_demo

Examples

region_isos
#> # A tibble: 1,044 x 2
#>    region isos 
#>    <chr>  <chr>
#>  1 global af   
#>  2 global al   
#>  3 global dz   
#>  4 global as   
#>  5 global ad   
#>  6 global ao   
#>  7 global ai   
#>  8 global ag   
#>  9 global ar   
#> 10 global am   
#> # … with 1,034 more rows
